author: Preeti Singh, Laura Cooper
title: Private-Equity Backed Tech Companies Help Governments Combat Coronavirus - The Wall Street Journal
description: Aside from allocating cash, an increasing number of sponsors in the software sector are enlisting their portfolio companies to help governments with the coronavirus pandemic
content:
Private-equity firms are offering more than just money to help combat the coronavirus pandemic.
Although some sponsors are setting up relief funds to help portfolio company employees and communities affected by the virus, many others are leveraging the abili… [+115 chars]
